    80â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
    81â†’# DEPENDENCY CHECKING AND AUTO-FIXING
    82â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
    83â†’
    84â†’# Function to check if command exists
    85â†’command_exists() {
    86â†’    command -v "$1" >/dev/null 2>&1
    87â†’}
    88â†’
    89â†’# Function to check Node.js and npm
    90â†’check_node_npm() {
    91â†’    local has_issues=false
    92â†’    
    93â†’    if ! command_exists node; then
    94â†’        log_error "Node.js is not installed"
    95â†’        has_issues=true
    96â†’    else
    97â†’        local node_version=$(node --version 2>/dev/null | sed 's/v//')
    98â†’        log_debug "Node.js version: $node_version"
    99â†’        
   100â†’        # Check if version is sufficient (>= 14.0.0)
   101â†’        local major_version=$(echo "$node_version" | cut -d. -f1)
   102â†’        if [[ "$major_version" -lt 14 ]]; then
   103â†’            log_warning "Node.js version is old ($node_version). Consider upgrading to 14+"
   104â†’        fi
   105â†’    fi
   106â†’    
   107â†’    if ! command_exists npm; then
   108â†’        log_error "npm is not installed"
   109â†’        has_issues=true
   110â†’    else
   111â†’        log_debug "npm version: $(npm --version 2>/dev/null)"
   112â†’    fi
   113â†’    
   114â†’    return $([ "$has_issues" = true ] && echo 1 || echo 0)
   115â†’}
   116â†’
   117â†’# Function to verify Claude installation health
   118â†’verify_claude_health() {
   119â†’    local claude_path="$1"
   120â†’    
   121â†’    if [[ ! -f "$claude_path" ]]; then
   122â†’        return 1
   123â†’    fi
   124â†’    
   125â†’    # Check if yoga.wasm issue exists by attempting a dry run
   126â†’    local test_output=$(node "$claude_path" --version 2>&1)
   127â†’    local exit_code=$?
   128â†’    
   129â†’    if [[ $exit_code -ne 0 ]]; then
   130â†’        if echo "$test_output" | grep -q "yoga.wasm"; then
   131â†’            log_warning "Detected yoga.wasm issue"
   132â†’            return 2  # Special code for yoga.wasm issue
   133â†’        elif echo "$test_output" | grep -q "Cannot find module"; then
   134â†’            log_warning "Missing module detected"
   135â†’            return 3  # Missing modules
   136â†’        else
   137â†’            log_debug "Unknown error: $test_output"
   138â†’            return 1  # General error
   139â†’        fi
   140â†’    fi
   141â†’    
   142â†’    log_debug "Claude health check passed"
   143â†’    return 0
   144â†’}
   145â†’
   146â†’# Function to fix yoga.wasm issue
   147â†’fix_yoga_wasm_issue() {
   148â†’    log_fixing "Attempting to fix yoga.wasm issue..."
   149â†’    
   150â†’    # Method 1: Set environment variable to bypass yoga
   151â†’    export CLAUDE_NO_YOGA=1
   152â†’    export NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings"
   153â†’    
   154â†’    # Method 2: Try reinstalling if user confirms
   155â†’    if [[ "${CLAUDE_AUTO_FIX:-false}" == "true" ]]; then
   156â†’        log_info "Auto-fix enabled. Reinstalling Claude Code..."
   157â†’        
   158â†’        # Save current directory
   159â†’        local current_dir=$(pwd)
   160â†’        
   161â†’        # Uninstall and reinstall
   162â†’        npm uninstall -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code >/dev/null 2>&1
   163â†’        npm cache clean --force >/dev/null 2>&1
   164â†’        npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code --force >/dev/null 2>&1
   165â†’        
   166â†’        # Return to original directory
   167â†’        cd "$current_dir"
   168â†’        
   169â†’        if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
   170â†’            log_success "Claude Code reinstalled successfully"
   171â†’            return 0
   172â†’        else
   173â†’            log_warning "Reinstall failed, using workaround mode"
   174â†’        fi
   175â†’    fi
   176â†’    
   177â†’    # Method 3: Create yoga.wasm placeholder if needed
   178â†’    local claude_dir=""
   179â†’    for dir in \
   180â†’        "$HOME/.npm-global/lib/node_modules/@anthropic-ai/claude-code" \
   181â†’        "/usr/local/lib/node_modules/@anthropic-ai/claude-code" \
   182â†’        "$(npm root -g)/@anthropic-ai/claude-code"; do
   183â†’        if [[ -d "$dir" ]]; then
   184â†’            claude_dir="$dir"
   185â†’            break
   186â†’        fi
   187â†’    done
   188â†’    
   189â†’    if [[ -n "$claude_dir" ]] && [[ ! -f "$claude_dir/yoga.wasm" ]]; then
   190â†’        echo "// Placeholder" > "$claude_dir/yoga.wasm" 2>/dev/null || true
   191â†’        log_debug "Created yoga.wasm placeholder"
   192â†’    fi
   193â†’    
   194â†’    return 0
   195â†’}
   196â†’
   197â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   198â†’# VIRTUAL ENVIRONMENT ACTIVATION
   199â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   200â†’
   201â†’activate_venv() {
   202â†’    local venv_paths=(
   203â†’        "${CLAUDE_VENV:-}"
   204â†’        "$HOME/.local/share/claude/venv"
   205â†’        "$HOME/Documents/claude-backups/venv"
   206â†’        "$HOME/Documents/Claude/venv"
   207â†’        "$HOME/.claude-venv"
   208â†’        "./venv"
   209â†’        "./.venv"
   210â†’    )
   211â†’    
   212â†’    for venv_path in "${venv_paths[@]}"; do
   213â†’        if [[ -n "$venv_path" ]] && [[ -d "$venv_path" ]] && [[ -f "$venv_path/bin/activate" ]]; then
   214â†’            log_debug "Activating virtual environment: $venv_path"
   215â†’            
   216â†’            export VIRTUAL_ENV="$venv_path"
   217â†’            export PATH="$venv_path/bin:$PATH"
   218â†’            export PYTHONPATH="$venv_path/lib/python*/site-packages:${PYTHONPATH:-}"
   219â†’            unset PYTHONHOME
   220â†’            
   221â†’            export CLAUDE_VENV_ACTIVATED="true"
   222â†’            export CLAUDE_VENV_PATH="$venv_path"
   223â†’            
   224â†’            return 0
   225â†’        fi
   226â†’    done
   227â†’    
   228â†’    export CLAUDE_VENV_ACTIVATED="false"
   229â†’    return 1
   230â†’}
   231â†’
   232â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   233â†’# INTELLIGENT PATH DISCOVERY
   234â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   235â†’
   236â†’find_project_root() {
   237â†’    local current_dir="$(pwd 2>/dev/null || echo "$HOME")"
   238â†’    local search_paths=(
   239â†’        "$current_dir"
   240â†’        "${CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT:-}"
   241â†’        "$HOME/Documents/Claude"
   242â†’        "$HOME/Documents/claude-backups"
   243â†’        "$HOME/claude-backups"
   244â†’        "$HOME/projects/claude"
   245â†’        "$HOME/workspace/claude"
   246â†’    )
   247â†’    
   248â†’    for path in "${search_paths[@]}"; do
   249â†’        if [[ -n "$path" ]] && [[ -d "$path" ]]; then
   250â†’            if [[ -d "$path/agents" ]] || [[ -f "$path/CLAUDE.md" ]] || [[ -d "$path/.claude" ]]; then
   251â†’                echo "$path"
   252â†’                return 0
   253â†’            fi
   254â†’        fi
   255â†’    done
   256â†’    
   257â†’    echo "$HOME/claude-project"
   258â†’    mkdir -p "$HOME/claude-project" 2>/dev/null || true
   259â†’}
   260â†’
   261â†’find_claude_binary() {
   262â†’    local search_paths=(
   263â†’        # Check npm global installations
   264â†’        "$(npm root -g 2>/dev/null)/@anthropic-ai/claude-code/cli.js"
   265â†’        "$HOME/.npm-global/lib/node_modules/@anthropic-ai/claude-code/cli.js"
   266â†’        "$HOME/.npm-global/bin/claude"
   267â†’        "/usr/local/lib/node_modules/@anthropic-ai/claude-code/cli.js"
   268â†’        "/usr/local/bin/claude"
   269â†’        
   270â†’        # Check PATH
   271â†’        "$(which claude 2>/dev/null || true)"
   272â†’        "$(which claude-code 2>/dev/null || true)"
   273â†’    )
   274â†’    
   275â†’    # Also check npm bin if npm exists
   276â†’    if command_exists npm; then
   277â†’        local npm_bin=$(npm bin -g 2>/dev/null)
   278â†’        if [[ -n "$npm_bin" ]]; then
   279â†’            search_paths+=("$npm_bin/claude")
   280â†’            search_paths+=("$npm_bin/claude-code")
   281â†’        fi
   282â†’    fi
   283â†’    
   284â†’    for path in "${search_paths[@]}"; do
   285â†’        if [[ -n "$path" ]] && [[ -f "$path" ]]; then
   286â†’            log_debug "Found Claude binary: $path"
   287â†’            echo "$path"
   288â†’            return 0
   289â†’        fi
   290â†’    done
   291â†’    
   292â†’    return 1
   293â†’}
   294â†’
   295â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   296â†’# SMART EXECUTION WITH FALLBACKS
   297â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   298â†’
   299â†’execute_claude() {
   300â†’    local claude_binary="$1"
   301â†’    shift
   302â†’    local args=("$@")
   303â†’    
   304â†’    # Add permission bypass if enabled
   305â†’    if [[ "${PERMISSION_BYPASS:-false}" == "true" ]] && [[ "${args[0]}" != "--safe" ]]; then
   306â†’        args=("--dangerously-skip-permissions" "${args[@]}")
   307â†’    fi
   308â†’    
   309â†’    # Remove --safe flag if present
   310â†’    if [[ "${args[0]}" == "--safe" ]]; then
   311â†’        args=("${args[@]:1}")
   312â†’        PERMISSION_BYPASS="false"
   313â†’    fi
   314â†’    
   315â†’    log_debug "Executing: $claude_binary ${args[*]}"
   316â†’    
   317â†’    # Method 1: Try direct execution
   318â†’    if [[ -x "$claude_binary" ]]; then
   319â†’        exec "$claude_binary" "${args[@]}" 2>&1
   320â†’    fi
   321â†’    
   322â†’    # Method 2: Try with node
   323â†’    if command_exists node; then
   324â†’        exec node "$claude_binary" "${args[@]}" 2>&1
   325â†’    fi
   326â†’    
   327â†’    # Method 3: Try with npx
   328â†’    if command_exists npx; then
   329â†’        exec npx @anthropic-ai/claude-code "${args[@]}" 2>&1
   330â†’    fi
   331â†’    
   332â†’    log_error "All execution methods failed"
   333â†’    return 1
   334â†’}
   335â†’
   336â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   337â†’# CONFIGURATION AND INITIALIZATION
   338â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   339â†’
   340â†’initialize_environment() {
   341â†’    # Activate virtual environment if available
   342â†’    activate_venv
   343â†’    
   344â†’    # Set up environment variables
   345â†’    export CLAUDE_HOME="${CLAUDE_HOME:-$HOME/.claude-home}"
   346â†’    export CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT="${CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT:-$(find_project_root)}"
   347â†’    
   348â†’    # Setup directories
   349â†’    if [[ -d "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT/.claude" ]]; then
   350â†’        export CLAUDE_DIR="$CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT/.claude"
   351â†’        export CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR="$CLAUDE_DIR/agents"
   352â†’        export CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR="$CLAUDE_DIR/config"
   353â†’    else
   354â†’        export CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR="${CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR:-$HOME/agents}"
   355â†’        export CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR="${CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR:-$HOME/.config/claude}"
   356â†’    fi
   357â†’    
   358â†’    # Cache directory
   359â†’    export CACHE_DIR="${CLAUDE_CACHE_DIR:-$HOME/.cache/claude}"
   360â†’    mkdir -p "$CACHE_DIR" 2>/dev/null || export CACHE_DIR="/tmp/claude-cache-$$"
   361â†’    
   362â†’    # Feature flags
   363â†’    export PERMISSION_BYPASS="${CLAUDE_PERMISSION_BYPASS:-true}"
   364â†’    export AUTO_FIX="${CLAUDE_AUTO_FIX:-true}"
   365â†’    export ORCHESTRATION_ENABLED="${CLAUDE_ORCHESTRATION:-true}"
   366â†’    export LEARNING_MODE="${CLAUDE_LEARNING:-true}"
   367â†’    
   368â†’    # Set Node options for better compatibility
   369â†’    export NODE_OPTIONS="${NODE_OPTIONS:---no-warnings}"
   370â†’    export CLAUDE_NO_YOGA="${CLAUDE_NO_YOGA:-1}"
   371â†’    
   372â†’    log_debug "Environment initialized"
   373â†’}
   374â†’
   375â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   376â†’# ENHANCED STATUS DISPLAY
   377â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   378â†’
   379â†’show_status() {
   380â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
   381â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}          Claude Ultimate Wrapper v11.0 Status${NC}"
   382â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
   383â†’    echo
   384â†’    
   385â†’    # System Info
   386â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}System:${NC}"
   387â†’    echo "  OS: $(uname -s 2>/dev/null || echo 'Unknown')"
   388â†’    echo "  User: $USER"
   389â†’    echo "  Shell: ${SHELL##*/}"
   390â†’    echo
   391â†’    
   392â†’    # Node.js and npm
   393â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}Node Environment:${NC}"
   394â†’    if command_exists node; then
   395â†’        echo -e "  Node.js: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS}${NC} $(node --version)"
   396â†’    else
   397â†’        echo -e "  Node.js: ${RED}${ERROR} Not installed${NC}"
   398â†’    fi
   399â†’    
   400â†’    if command_exists npm; then
   401â†’        echo -e "  npm: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS}${NC} v$(npm --version)"
   402â†’        echo "  Global prefix: $(npm config get prefix 2>/dev/null)"
   403â†’    else
   404â†’        echo -e "  npm: ${RED}${ERROR} Not installed${NC}"
   405â†’    fi
   406â†’    echo
   407â†’    
   408â†’    # Claude Binary
   409â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}Claude Installation:${NC}"
   410â†’    local claude_binary=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
   411â†’    if [[ -n "$claude_binary" ]]; then
   412â†’        echo -e "  Binary: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS}${NC} $claude_binary"
   413â†’        
   414â†’        # Health check
   415â†’        verify_claude_health "$claude_binary"
   416â†’        local health_status=$?
   417â†’        case $health_status in
   418â†’            0) echo -e "  Health: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS} Operational${NC}" ;;
   419â†’            2) echo -e "  Health: ${YELLOW}${WARNING} yoga.wasm issue detected (auto-fix available)${NC}" ;;
   420â†’            3) echo -e "  Health: ${YELLOW}${WARNING} Missing modules${NC}" ;;
   421â†’            *) echo -e "  Health: ${RED}${ERROR} Issues detected${NC}" ;;
   422â†’        esac
   423â†’    else
   424â†’        echo -e "  Binary: ${RED}${ERROR} Not found${NC}"
   425â†’        echo "  Install: npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code"
   426â†’    fi
   427â†’    echo
   428â†’    
   429â†’    # Virtual Environment
   430â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}Python Environment:${NC}"
   431â†’    if [[ "${CLAUDE_VENV_ACTIVATED:-false}" == "true" ]]; then
   432â†’        echo -e "  Venv: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS} Active${NC}"
   433â†’        echo "  Path: ${CLAUDE_VENV_PATH}"
   434â†’        echo "  Python: $(which python3 2>/dev/null || echo 'not found')"
   435â†’    else
   436â†’        echo -e "  Venv: ${DIM}Not active${NC}"
   437â†’        echo "  Python: $(which python3 2>/dev/null || echo 'system default')"
   438â†’    fi
   439â†’    echo
   440â†’    
   441â†’    # Directories
   442â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}Directories:${NC}"
   443â†’    echo "  Project: $CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT"
   444â†’    [[ -d "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" ]] && echo "  Agents: $CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR ($(find "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" -name "*.md" 2>/dev/null | wc -l) found)"
   445â†’    echo "  Cache: $CACHE_DIR"
   446â†’    echo
   447â†’    
   448â†’    # Features
   449â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}Features:${NC}"
   450â†’    [[ "$PERMISSION_BYPASS" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Permission Bypass: ${GREEN}Enabled${NC}" || echo -e "  Permission Bypass: ${DIM}Disabled${NC}"
   451â†’    [[ "$AUTO_FIX" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Auto-Fix: ${GREEN}Enabled${NC}" || echo -e "  Auto-Fix: ${DIM}Disabled${NC}"
   452â†’    [[ "$ORCHESTRATION_ENABLED" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Orchestration: ${GREEN}Enabled${NC}" || echo -e "  Orchestration: ${DIM}Disabled${NC}"
   453â†’    [[ "$LEARNING_MODE" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Learning Mode: ${GREEN}Enabled${NC}" || echo -e "  Learning Mode: ${DIM}Disabled${NC}"
   454â†’    [[ "$DEBUG_MODE" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Debug Mode: ${GREEN}Active${NC}" || echo -e "  Debug Mode: ${DIM}Inactive${NC}"
   455â†’    echo
   456â†’    
   457â†’    # Quick Commands
   458â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}Quick Commands:${NC}"
   459â†’    echo "  claude --help          Show help"
   460â†’    echo "  claude --fix           Auto-fix issues"
   461â†’    echo "  claude --safe          Run without permission bypass"
   462â†’    echo "  claude task <text>     Execute a task"
   463â†’    echo "  claude agent <name>    Run specific agent"
   464â†’}
   465â†’
   466â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   467â†’# AUTO-FIX FUNCTION
   468â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   469â†’
   470â†’auto_fix_issues() {
   471â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
   472â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}              Claude Auto-Fix System${NC}"
   473â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
   474â†’    echo
   475â†’    
   476â†’    log_info "Checking for issues..."
   477â†’    
   478â†’    # Check Node/npm
   479â†’    if ! check_node_npm; then
   480â†’        log_error "Node.js/npm issues detected. Please install Node.js 14+ and npm."
   481â†’        return 1
   482â†’    fi
   483â†’    
   484â†’    # Find and check Claude binary
   485â†’    local claude_binary=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
   486â†’    if [[ -z "$claude_binary" ]]; then
   487â†’        log_fixing "Claude not found. Installing..."
   488â†’        npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code --force
   489â†’        
   490â†’        claude_binary=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
   491â†’        if [[ -n "$claude_binary" ]]; then
   492â†’            log_success "Claude installed successfully"
   493â†’        else
   494â†’            log_error "Failed to install Claude"
   495â†’            return 1
   496â†’        fi
   497â†’    fi
   498â†’    
   499â†’    # Check health
   500â†’    verify_claude_health "$claude_binary"
   501â†’    local health_status=$?
   502â†’    
   503â†’    case $health_status in
   504â†’        0)
   505â†’            log_success "Claude is healthy - no issues found"
   506â†’            ;;
   507â†’        2)
   508â†’            log_fixing "Fixing yoga.wasm issue..."
   509â†’            fix_yoga_wasm_issue
   510â†’            
   511â†’            # Verify fix
   512â†’            verify_claude_health "$claude_binary"
   513â†’            if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
   514â†’                log_success "yoga.wasm issue fixed"
   515â†’            else
   516â†’                log_warning "yoga.wasm workaround applied"
   517â†’            fi
   518â†’            ;;
   519â†’        *)
   520â†’            log_fixing "Attempting general fixes..."
   521â†’            npm cache clean --force >/dev/null 2>&1
   522â†’            npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code --force >/dev/null 2>&1
   523â†’            
   524â†’            verify_claude_health "$claude_binary"
   525â†’            if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
   526â†’                log_success "Issues resolved"
   527â†’            else
   528â†’                log_warning "Some issues remain - using workaround mode"
   529â†’            fi
   530â†’            ;;
   531â†’    esac
   532â†’    
   533â†’    echo
   534â†’    log_info "Auto-fix complete. Run 'claude --status' to verify."
   535â†’}
   536â†’
   537â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   538â†’# AGENT MANAGEMENT
   539â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   540â†’
   541â†’list_agents() {
   542â†’    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}Available Agents:${NC}"
   543â†’    echo
   544â†’    
   545â†’    if [[ ! -d "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" ]]; then
   546â†’        log_warning "Agents directory not found: $CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR"
   547â†’        return 1
   548â†’    fi
   549â†’    
   550â†’    local count=0
   551â†’    while IFS= read -r agent_file; do
   552â†’        local agent_name=$(basename "$agent_file" | sed 's/\.[mM][dD]$//')
   553â†’        local category="general"
   554â†’        
   555â†’        # Try to extract category from frontmatter
   556â†’        if grep -q "^category:" "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null; then
   557â†’            category=$(grep "^category:" "$agent_file" | head -1 | sed 's/category: *//')
   558â†’        fi
   559â†’        
   560â†’        printf "  %-20s ${DIM}[%s]${NC}\n" "$agent_name" "$category"
   561â†’        ((count++))
   562â†’    done < <(find "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.MD" \) 2>/dev/null | sort)
   563â†’    
   564â†’    echo
   565â†’    echo "Total: $count agents"
   566â†’}
   567â†’
   568â†’run_agent() {
   569â†’    local agent_name="$1"
   570â†’    shift
   571â†’    
   572â†’    if [[ -z "$agent_name" ]]; then
   573â†’        log_error "Usage: claude agent <name> [args]"
   574â†’        return 1
   575â†’    fi
   576â†’    
   577â†’    # Find agent file (case-insensitive)
   578â†’    local agent_file=""
   579â†’    for pattern in \
   580â†’        "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR/${agent_name}.md" \
   581â†’        "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR/${agent_name}.MD" \
   582â†’        "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR/${agent_name^^}.md" \
   583â†’        "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR/${agent_name,,}.md"; do
   584â†’        if [[ -f "$pattern" ]]; then
   585â†’            agent_file="$pattern"
   586â†’            break
   587â†’        fi
   588â†’    done
   589â†’    
   590â†’    if [[ -z "$agent_file" ]]; then
   591â†’        log_error "Agent not found: $agent_name"
   592â†’        log_info "Run 'claude agents' to see available agents"
   593â†’        return 1
   594â†’    fi
   595â†’    
   596â†’    log_info "Loading agent: $agent_name"
   597â†’    export CLAUDE_AGENT="$agent_name"
   598â†’    export CLAUDE_AGENT_FILE="$agent_file"
   599â†’    
   600â†’    execute_claude "$CLAUDE_BINARY" "$@"
   601â†’}
   602â†’
   603â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   604â†’# MAIN EXECUTION
   605â†’# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
   606â†’
   607â†’main() {
   608â†’    # Initialize environment
   609â†’    initialize_environment
   610â†’    
   611â†’    # Handle special commands
   612â†’    case "${1:-}" in
   613â†’        --status|status)
   614â†’            show_status
   615â†’            exit 0
   616â†’            ;;
   617â†’            
   618â†’        --fix|fix)
   619â†’            auto_fix_issues
   620â†’            exit $?
   621â†’            ;;
   622â†’            
   623â†’        --agents|agents|--list-agents)
   624â†’            list_agents
   625â†’            exit 0
   626â†’            ;;
   627â†’            
   628â†’        --agent|agent)
   629â†’            shift
   630â†’            run_agent "$@"
   631â†’            exit $?
   632â†’            ;;
   633â†’            
   634â†’        --help|help|-h)
   635â†’            echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}Claude Ultimate Wrapper v11.0${NC}"
   636â†’            echo -e "${DIM}Enhanced with yoga.wasm protection and auto-recovery${NC}"
   637â†’            echo
   638â†’            echo "Usage: claude [OPTIONS] [COMMAND]"
   639â†’            echo
   640â†’            echo "Options:"
   641â†’            echo "  --status       Show comprehensive system status"
   642â†’            echo "  --fix          Auto-detect and fix issues"
   643â†’            echo "  --agents       List available agents"
   644â†’            echo "  --agent NAME   Run specific agent"
   645â†’            echo "  --safe         Run without permission bypass"
   646â†’            echo "  --debug        Enable debug output"
   647â†’            echo "  --help         Show this help"
   648â†’            echo
   649â†’            echo "Commands:"
   650â†’            echo "  task <text>    Execute a task"
   651â†’            echo "  <any>          Pass through to Claude"
   652â†’            echo
   653â†’            echo "Environment Variables:"
   654â†’            echo "  CLAUDE_AUTO_FIX=true         Enable automatic issue fixing"
   655â†’            echo "  CLAUDE_PERMISSION_BYPASS=true Enable permission bypass"
   656â†’            echo "  CLAUDE_DEBUG=true            Enable debug mode"
   657â†’            echo "  CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT          Set project root directory"
   658â†’            echo "  CLAUDE_VENV                  Path to Python virtual environment"
   659â†’            echo
   660â†’            echo "Troubleshooting:"
   661â†’            echo "  If Claude fails to start, run: claude --fix"
   662â†’            echo "  For detailed diagnostics: claude --status"
   663â†’            echo "  For debug output: claude --debug [command]"
   664â†’            exit 0
   665â†’            ;;
   666â†’            
   667â†’        --debug)
   668â†’            # Already handled at top, just shift and continue
   669â†’            shift
   670â†’            ;;
   671â†’    esac
   672â†’    
   673â†’    # Find Claude binary
   674â†’    CLAUDE_BINARY=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
   675â†’    
   676â†’    if [[ -z "$CLAUDE_BINARY" ]]; then
   677â†’        log_error "Claude not found. Installing..."
   678â†’        
   679â†’        if [[ "$AUTO_FIX" == "true" ]]; then
   680â†’            npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code --force
   681â†’            CLAUDE_BINARY=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
   682â†’            
   683â†’            if [[ -z "$CLAUDE_BINARY" ]]; then
   684â†’                log_error "Failed to install Claude Code"
   685â†’                echo "Try manual installation: npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code"
   686â†’                exit 1
   687â†’            fi
   688â†’        else
   689â†’            echo "Install with: npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code"
   690â†’            echo "Or enable auto-fix: export CLAUDE_AUTO_FIX=true"
   691â†’            exit 1
   692â†’        fi
   693â†’    fi
   694â†’    
   695â†’    # Health check
   696â†’    verify_claude_health "$CLAUDE_BINARY"
   697â†’    local health_status=$?
   698â†’    
   699â†’    if [[ $health_status -ne 0 ]] && [[ "$AUTO_FIX" == "true" ]]; then
   700â†’        log_info "Applying automatic fixes..."
   701â†’        
   702â†’        case $health_status in
   703â†’            2) fix_yoga_wasm_issue ;;
   704â†’            *) 
   705â†’                # Try general fix
   706â†’                export NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings"
   707â†’                export CLAUDE_NO_YOGA=1
   708â†’                ;;
   709â†’        esac
   710â†’    fi
   711â†’    
   712â†’    # Execute Claude
   713â†’    execute_claude "$CLAUDE_BINARY" "$@"
   714â†’}
   715â†’
   716â†’# Error trap with helpful messages
   717â†’trap 'ec=$?; [[ $ec -ne 0 ]] && log_error "Error at line $LINENO (exit code: $ec). Run with --debug for details." >&2' ERR
   718â†’
   719â†’# Run main
   720â†’main "$@"

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it looks malicious. If it does, you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer high-level questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

#!/bin/bash
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# CLAUDE ULTIMATE WRAPPER v11.0 - ENHANCED WITH YOGA.WASM PROTECTION
# 
# Features:
# â€¢ Automatic yoga.wasm error detection and recovery
# â€¢ Self-healing npm package management
# â€¢ Multiple execution fallback methods
# â€¢ Robust error handling to prevent crashes
# â€¢ Automatic virtual environment activation
# â€¢ Smart dependency checking and auto-fixing
# â€¢ Performance monitoring and caching
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Don't exit on errors - handle them gracefully
set +e

# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
# COLORS AND SYMBOLS (SAFE)
# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

# Check if terminal supports colors
if [[ -t 1 ]] && [[ "$(tput colors 2>/dev/null || echo 0)" -ge 8 ]]; then
    readonly GREEN='\033[0;32m'
    readonly YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
    readonly CYAN='\033[0;36m'
    readonly MAGENTA='\033[0;35m'
    readonly RED='\033[0;31m'
    readonly BOLD='\033[1m'
    readonly DIM='\033[2m'
    readonly NC='\033[0m'
else
    readonly GREEN='' YELLOW='' CYAN='' MAGENTA='' RED='' BOLD='' DIM='' NC=''
fi

# Status symbols
readonly SUCCESS="âœ“"
readonly ERROR="âœ—"
readonly WARNING="âš "
readonly INFO="â„¹"
readonly FIXING="ğŸ”§"

# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
# DEBUG AND LOGGING
# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

# Enable debug mode if requested
DEBUG_MODE="${CLAUDE_DEBUG:-false}"
if [[ "$1" == "--debug" ]]; then
    DEBUG_MODE="true"
    shift
    set -x
fi

# Logging function
log_debug() {
    [[ "$DEBUG_MODE" == "true" ]] && echo -e "${DIM}[DEBUG] $1${NC}" >&2
}

log_error() {
    echo -e "${RED}${ERROR} $1${NC}" >&2
}

log_success() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}${SUCCESS} $1${NC}" >&2
}

log_warning() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}${WARNING} $1${NC}" >&2
}

log_info() {
    echo -e "${CYAN}${INFO} $1${NC}" >&2
}

log_fixing() {
    echo -e "${MAGENTA}${FIXING} $1${NC}" >&2
}

# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
# DEPENDENCY CHECKING AND AUTO-FIXING
# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

# Function to check if command exists
command_exists() {
    command -v "$1" >/dev/null 2>&1
}

# Function to check Node.js and npm
check_node_npm() {
    local has_issues=false
    
    if ! command_exists node; then
        log_error "Node.js is not installed"
        has_issues=true
    else
        local node_version=$(node --version 2>/dev/null | sed 's/v//')
        log_debug "Node.js version: $node_version"
        
        # Check if version is sufficient (>= 14.0.0)
        local major_version=$(echo "$node_version" | cut -d. -f1)
        if [[ "$major_version" -lt 14 ]]; then
            log_warning "Node.js version is old ($node_version). Consider upgrading to 14+"
        fi
    fi
    
    if ! command_exists npm; then
        log_error "npm is not installed"
        has_issues=true
    else
        log_debug "npm version: $(npm --version 2>/dev/null)"
    fi
    
    return $([ "$has_issues" = true ] && echo 1 || echo 0)
}

# Function to verify Claude installation health
verify_claude_health() {
    local claude_path="$1"
    
    if [[ ! -f "$claude_path" ]]; then
        return 1
    fi
    
    # Check if yoga.wasm issue exists by attempting a dry run
    local test_output=$(node "$claude_path" --version 2>&1)
    local exit_code=$?
    
    if [[ $exit_code -ne 0 ]]; then
        if echo "$test_output" | grep -q "yoga.wasm"; then
            log_warning "Detected yoga.wasm issue"
            return 2  # Special code for yoga.wasm issue
        elif echo "$test_output" | grep -q "Cannot find module"; then
            log_warning "Missing module detected"
            return 3  # Missing modules
        else
            log_debug "Unknown error: $test_output"
            return 1  # General error
        fi
    fi
    
    log_debug "Claude health check passed"
    return 0
}

# Function to fix yoga.wasm issue
fix_yoga_wasm_issue() {
    log_fixing "Attempting to fix yoga.wasm issue..."
    
    # Method 1: Set environment variable to bypass yoga
    export CLAUDE_NO_YOGA=1
    export NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings"
    
    # Method 2: Try reinstalling if user confirms
    if [[ "${CLAUDE_AUTO_FIX:-false}" == "true" ]]; then
        log_info "Auto-fix enabled. Reinstalling Claude Code..."
        
        # Save current directory
        local current_dir=$(pwd)
        
        # Uninstall and reinstall
        npm uninstall -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code >/dev/null 2>&1
        npm cache clean --force >/dev/null 2>&1
        npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code --force >/dev/null 2>&1
        
        # Return to original directory
        cd "$current_dir"
        
        if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
            log_success "Claude Code reinstalled successfully"
            return 0
        else
            log_warning "Reinstall failed, using workaround mode"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Method 3: Create yoga.wasm placeholder if needed
    local claude_dir=""
    for dir in \
        "$HOME/.npm-global/lib/node_modules/@anthropic-ai/claude-code" \
        "/usr/local/lib/node_modules/@anthropic-ai/claude-code" \
        "$(npm root -g)/@anthropic-ai/claude-code"; do
        if [[ -d "$dir" ]]; then
            claude_dir="$dir"
            break
        fi
    done
    
    if [[ -n "$claude_dir" ]] && [[ ! -f "$claude_dir/yoga.wasm" ]]; then
        echo "// Placeholder" > "$claude_dir/yoga.wasm" 2>/dev/null || true
        log_debug "Created yoga.wasm placeholder"
    fi
    
    return 0
}

# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
# VIRTUAL ENVIRONMENT ACTIVATION
# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

activate_venv() {
    local venv_paths=(
        "${CLAUDE_VENV:-}"
        "$HOME/.local/share/claude/venv"
        "$HOME/Documents/claude-backups/venv"
        "$HOME/Documents/Claude/venv"
        "$HOME/.claude-venv"
        "./venv"
        "./.venv"
    )
    
    for venv_path in "${venv_paths[@]}"; do
        if [[ -n "$venv_path" ]] && [[ -d "$venv_path" ]] && [[ -f "$venv_path/bin/activate" ]]; then
            log_debug "Activating virtual environment: $venv_path"
            
            export VIRTUAL_ENV="$venv_path"
            export PATH="$venv_path/bin:$PATH"
            export PYTHONPATH="$venv_path/lib/python*/site-packages:${PYTHONPATH:-}"
            unset PYTHONHOME
            
            export CLAUDE_VENV_ACTIVATED="true"
            export CLAUDE_VENV_PATH="$venv_path"
            
            return 0
        fi
    done
    
    export CLAUDE_VENV_ACTIVATED="false"
    return 1
}

# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
# INTELLIGENT PATH DISCOVERY
# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

find_project_root() {
    local current_dir="$(pwd 2>/dev/null || echo "$HOME")"
    local search_paths=(
        "$current_dir"
        "${CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT:-}"
        "$HOME/Documents/Claude"
        "$HOME/Documents/claude-backups"
        "$HOME/claude-backups"
        "$HOME/projects/claude"
        "$HOME/workspace/claude"
    )
    
    for path in "${search_paths[@]}"; do
        if [[ -n "$path" ]] && [[ -d "$path" ]]; then
            if [[ -d "$path/agents" ]] || [[ -f "$path/CLAUDE.md" ]] || [[ -d "$path/.claude" ]]; then
                echo "$path"
                return 0
            fi
        fi
    done
    
    echo "$HOME/claude-project"
    mkdir -p "$HOME/claude-project" 2>/dev/null || true
}

find_claude_binary() {
    local search_paths=(
        # Check npm global installations
        "$(npm root -g 2>/dev/null)/@anthropic-ai/claude-code/cli.js"
        "$HOME/.npm-global/lib/node_modules/@anthropic-ai/claude-code/cli.js"
        "$HOME/.npm-global/bin/claude"
        "/usr/local/lib/node_modules/@anthropic-ai/claude-code/cli.js"
        "/usr/local/bin/claude"
        
        # Check PATH
        "$(which claude 2>/dev/null || true)"
        "$(which claude-code 2>/dev/null || true)"
    )
    
    # Also check npm bin if npm exists
    if command_exists npm; then
        local npm_bin=$(npm bin -g 2>/dev/null)
        if [[ -n "$npm_bin" ]]; then
            search_paths+=("$npm_bin/claude")
            search_paths+=("$npm_bin/claude-code")
        fi
    fi
    
    for path in "${search_paths[@]}"; do
        if [[ -n "$path" ]] && [[ -f "$path" ]]; then
            log_debug "Found Claude binary: $path"
            echo "$path"
            return 0
        fi
    done
    
    return 1
}

# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
# SMART EXECUTION WITH FALLBACKS
# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

execute_claude() {
    local claude_binary="$1"
    shift
    local args=("$@")
    
    # Add permission bypass if enabled
    if [[ "${PERMISSION_BYPASS:-false}" == "true" ]] && [[ "${args[0]}" != "--safe" ]]; then
        args=("--dangerously-skip-permissions" "${args[@]}")
    fi
    
    # Remove --safe flag if present
    if [[ "${args[0]}" == "--safe" ]]; then
        args=("${args[@]:1}")
        PERMISSION_BYPASS="false"
    fi
    
    log_debug "Executing: $claude_binary ${args[*]}"
    
    # Method 1: Try direct execution
    if [[ -x "$claude_binary" ]]; then
        exec "$claude_binary" "${args[@]}" 2>&1
    fi
    
    # Method 2: Try with node
    if command_exists node; then
        exec node "$claude_binary" "${args[@]}" 2>&1
    fi
    
    # Method 3: Try with npx
    if command_exists npx; then
        exec npx @anthropic-ai/claude-code "${args[@]}" 2>&1
    fi
    
    log_error "All execution methods failed"
    return 1
}

# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
# CONFIGURATION AND INITIALIZATION
# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

initialize_environment() {
    # Activate virtual environment if available
    activate_venv
    
    # Set up environment variables
    export CLAUDE_HOME="${CLAUDE_HOME:-$HOME/.claude-home}"
    export CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT="${CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT:-$(find_project_root)}"
    
    # Setup directories
    if [[ -d "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT/.claude" ]]; then
        export CLAUDE_DIR="$CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT/.claude"
        export CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR="$CLAUDE_DIR/agents"
        export CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR="$CLAUDE_DIR/config"
    else
        export CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR="${CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR:-$HOME/agents}"
        export CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR="${CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR:-$HOME/.config/claude}"
    fi
    
    # Cache directory
    export CACHE_DIR="${CLAUDE_CACHE_DIR:-$HOME/.cache/claude}"
    mkdir -p "$CACHE_DIR" 2>/dev/null || export CACHE_DIR="/tmp/claude-cache-$$"
    
    # Feature flags
    export PERMISSION_BYPASS="${CLAUDE_PERMISSION_BYPASS:-true}"
    export AUTO_FIX="${CLAUDE_AUTO_FIX:-true}"
    export ORCHESTRATION_ENABLED="${CLAUDE_ORCHESTRATION:-true}"
    export LEARNING_MODE="${CLAUDE_LEARNING:-true}"
    
    # Set Node options for better compatibility
    export NODE_OPTIONS="${NODE_OPTIONS:---no-warnings}"
    export CLAUDE_NO_YOGA="${CLAUDE_NO_YOGA:-1}"
    
    log_debug "Environment initialized"
}

# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
# ENHANCED STATUS DISPLAY
# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

show_status() {
    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}          Claude Ultimate Wrapper v11.0 Status${NC}"
    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
    echo
    
    # System Info
    echo -e "${BOLD}System:${NC}"
    echo "  OS: $(uname -s 2>/dev/null || echo 'Unknown')"
    echo "  User: $USER"
    echo "  Shell: ${SHELL##*/}"
    echo
    
    # Node.js and npm
    echo -e "${BOLD}Node Environment:${NC}"
    if command_exists node; then
        echo -e "  Node.js: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS}${NC} $(node --version)"
    else
        echo -e "  Node.js: ${RED}${ERROR} Not installed${NC}"
    fi
    
    if command_exists npm; then
        echo -e "  npm: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS}${NC} v$(npm --version)"
        echo "  Global prefix: $(npm config get prefix 2>/dev/null)"
    else
        echo -e "  npm: ${RED}${ERROR} Not installed${NC}"
    fi
    echo
    
    # Claude Binary
    echo -e "${BOLD}Claude Installation:${NC}"
    local claude_binary=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
    if [[ -n "$claude_binary" ]]; then
        echo -e "  Binary: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS}${NC} $claude_binary"
        
        # Health check
        verify_claude_health "$claude_binary"
        local health_status=$?
        case $health_status in
            0) echo -e "  Health: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS} Operational${NC}" ;;
            2) echo -e "  Health: ${YELLOW}${WARNING} yoga.wasm issue detected (auto-fix available)${NC}" ;;
            3) echo -e "  Health: ${YELLOW}${WARNING} Missing modules${NC}" ;;
            *) echo -e "  Health: ${RED}${ERROR} Issues detected${NC}" ;;
        esac
    else
        echo -e "  Binary: ${RED}${ERROR} Not found${NC}"
        echo "  Install: npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code"
    fi
    echo
    
    # Virtual Environment
    echo -e "${BOLD}Python Environment:${NC}"
    if [[ "${CLAUDE_VENV_ACTIVATED:-false}" == "true" ]]; then
        echo -e "  Venv: ${GREEN}${SUCCESS} Active${NC}"
        echo "  Path: ${CLAUDE_VENV_PATH}"
        echo "  Python: $(which python3 2>/dev/null || echo 'not found')"
    else
        echo -e "  Venv: ${DIM}Not active${NC}"
        echo "  Python: $(which python3 2>/dev/null || echo 'system default')"
    fi
    echo
    
    # Directories
    echo -e "${BOLD}Directories:${NC}"
    echo "  Project: $CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT"
    [[ -d "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" ]] && echo "  Agents: $CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR ($(find "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" -name "*.md" 2>/dev/null | wc -l) found)"
    echo "  Cache: $CACHE_DIR"
    echo
    
    # Features
    echo -e "${BOLD}Features:${NC}"
    [[ "$PERMISSION_BYPASS" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Permission Bypass: ${GREEN}Enabled${NC}" || echo -e "  Permission Bypass: ${DIM}Disabled${NC}"
    [[ "$AUTO_FIX" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Auto-Fix: ${GREEN}Enabled${NC}" || echo -e "  Auto-Fix: ${DIM}Disabled${NC}"
    [[ "$ORCHESTRATION_ENABLED" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Orchestration: ${GREEN}Enabled${NC}" || echo -e "  Orchestration: ${DIM}Disabled${NC}"
    [[ "$LEARNING_MODE" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Learning Mode: ${GREEN}Enabled${NC}" || echo -e "  Learning Mode: ${DIM}Disabled${NC}"
    [[ "$DEBUG_MODE" == "true" ]] && echo -e "  Debug Mode: ${GREEN}Active${NC}" || echo -e "  Debug Mode: ${DIM}Inactive${NC}"
    echo
    
    # Quick Commands
    echo -e "${BOLD}Quick Commands:${NC}"
    echo "  claude --help          Show help"
    echo "  claude --fix           Auto-fix issues"
    echo "  claude --safe          Run without permission bypass"
    echo "  claude task <text>     Execute a task"
    echo "  claude agent <name>    Run specific agent"
}

# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
# AUTO-FIX FUNCTION
# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

auto_fix_issues() {
    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}              Claude Auto-Fix System${NC}"
    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
    echo
    
    log_info "Checking for issues..."
    
    # Check Node/npm
    if ! check_node_npm; then
        log_error "Node.js/npm issues detected. Please install Node.js 14+ and npm."
        return 1
    fi
    
    # Find and check Claude binary
    local claude_binary=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
    if [[ -z "$claude_binary" ]]; then
        log_fixing "Claude not found. Installing..."
        npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code --force
        
        claude_binary=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
        if [[ -n "$claude_binary" ]]; then
            log_success "Claude installed successfully"
        else
            log_error "Failed to install Claude"
            return 1
        fi
    fi
    
    # Check health
    verify_claude_health "$claude_binary"
    local health_status=$?
    
    case $health_status in
        0)
            log_success "Claude is healthy - no issues found"
            ;;
        2)
            log_fixing "Fixing yoga.wasm issue..."
            fix_yoga_wasm_issue
            
            # Verify fix
            verify_claude_health "$claude_binary"
            if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
                log_success "yoga.wasm issue fixed"
            else
                log_warning "yoga.wasm workaround applied"
            fi
            ;;
        *)
            log_fixing "Attempting general fixes..."
            npm cache clean --force >/dev/null 2>&1
            npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code --force >/dev/null 2>&1
            
            verify_claude_health "$claude_binary"
            if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
                log_success "Issues resolved"
            else
                log_warning "Some issues remain - using workaround mode"
            fi
            ;;
    esac
    
    echo
    log_info "Auto-fix complete. Run 'claude --status' to verify."
}

# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
# AGENT MANAGEMENT
# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

list_agents() {
    echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}Available Agents:${NC}"
    echo
    
    if [[ ! -d "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" ]]; then
        log_warning "Agents directory not found: $CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR"
        return 1
    fi
    
    local count=0
    while IFS= read -r agent_file; do
        local agent_name=$(basename "$agent_file" | sed 's/\.[mM][dD]$//')
        local category="general"
        
        # Try to extract category from frontmatter
        if grep -q "^category:" "$agent_file" 2>/dev/null; then
            category=$(grep "^category:" "$agent_file" | head -1 | sed 's/category: *//')
        fi
        
        printf "  %-20s ${DIM}[%s]${NC}\n" "$agent_name" "$category"
        ((count++))
    done < <(find "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR" -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.MD" \) 2>/dev/null | sort)
    
    echo
    echo "Total: $count agents"
}

run_agent() {
    local agent_name="$1"
    shift
    
    if [[ -z "$agent_name" ]]; then
        log_error "Usage: claude agent <name> [args]"
        return 1
    fi
    
    # Find agent file (case-insensitive)
    local agent_file=""
    for pattern in \
        "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR/${agent_name}.md" \
        "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR/${agent_name}.MD" \
        "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR/${agent_name^^}.md" \
        "$CLAUDE_AGENTS_DIR/${agent_name,,}.md"; do
        if [[ -f "$pattern" ]]; then
            agent_file="$pattern"
            break
        fi
    done
    
    if [[ -z "$agent_file" ]]; then
        log_error "Agent not found: $agent_name"
        log_info "Run 'claude agents' to see available agents"
        return 1
    fi
    
    log_info "Loading agent: $agent_name"
    export CLAUDE_AGENT="$agent_name"
    export CLAUDE_AGENT_FILE="$agent_file"
    
    execute_claude "$CLAUDE_BINARY" "$@"
}

# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
# MAIN EXECUTION
# â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

main() {
    # Initialize environment
    initialize_environment
    
    # Handle special commands
    case "${1:-}" in
        --status|status)
            show_status
            exit 0
            ;;
            
        --fix|fix)
            auto_fix_issues
            exit $?
            ;;
            
        --agents|agents|--list-agents)
            list_agents
            exit 0
            ;;
            
        --agent|agent)
            shift
            run_agent "$@"
            exit $?
            ;;
            
        --help|help|-h)
            echo -e "${CYAN}${BOLD}Claude Ultimate Wrapper v11.0${NC}"
            echo -e "${DIM}Enhanced with yoga.wasm protection and auto-recovery${NC}"
            echo
            echo "Usage: claude [OPTIONS] [COMMAND]"
            echo
            echo "Options:"
            echo "  --status       Show comprehensive system status"
            echo "  --fix          Auto-detect and fix issues"
            echo "  --agents       List available agents"
            echo "  --agent NAME   Run specific agent"
            echo "  --safe         Run without permission bypass"
            echo "  --debug        Enable debug output"
            echo "  --help         Show this help"
            echo
            echo "Commands:"
            echo "  task <text>    Execute a task"
            echo "  <any>          Pass through to Claude"
            echo
            echo "Environment Variables:"
            echo "  CLAUDE_AUTO_FIX=true         Enable automatic issue fixing"
            echo "  CLAUDE_PERMISSION_BYPASS=true Enable permission bypass"
            echo "  CLAUDE_DEBUG=true            Enable debug mode"
            echo "  CLAUDE_PROJECT_ROOT          Set project root directory"
            echo "  CLAUDE_VENV                  Path to Python virtual environment"
            echo
            echo "Troubleshooting:"
            echo "  If Claude fails to start, run: claude --fix"
            echo "  For detailed diagnostics: claude --status"
            echo "  For debug output: claude --debug [command]"
            exit 0
            ;;
            
        --debug)
            # Already handled at top, just shift and continue
            shift
            ;;
    esac
    
    # Find Claude binary
    CLAUDE_BINARY=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
    
    if [[ -z "$CLAUDE_BINARY" ]]; then
        log_error "Claude not found. Installing..."
        
        if [[ "$AUTO_FIX" == "true" ]]; then
            npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code --force
            CLAUDE_BINARY=$(find_claude_binary || echo "")
            
            if [[ -z "$CLAUDE_BINARY" ]]; then
                log_error "Failed to install Claude Code"
                echo "Try manual installation: npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code"
                exit 1
            fi
        else
            echo "Install with: npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code"
            echo "Or enable auto-fix: export CLAUDE_AUTO_FIX=true"
            exit 1
        fi
    fi
    
    # Health check
    verify_claude_health "$CLAUDE_BINARY"
    local health_status=$?
    
    if [[ $health_status -ne 0 ]] && [[ "$AUTO_FIX" == "true" ]]; then
        log_info "Applying automatic fixes..."
        
        case $health_status in
            2) fix_yoga_wasm_issue ;;
            *) 
                # Try general fix
                export NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings"
                export CLAUDE_NO_YOGA=1
                ;;
        esac
    fi
    
    # Execute Claude
    execute_claude "$CLAUDE_BINARY" "$@"
}

# Error trap with helpful messages
trap 'ec=$?; [[ $ec -ne 0 ]] && log_error "Error at line $LINENO (exit code: $ec). Run with --debug for details." >&2' ERR

# Run main
main "$@"
